name: Eschaton:Battle For Eternity
description:
Brand New Video Game (Demo/Proof Of Concept) entitled "Eschaton: Battle For Eternity" I created solely,  during the Fall 2018. Currently finishing Mobile build for iOS of this DEMO and it will be available soon for FREE Download.

All Assets including 3D & 2D Models & Animations, All Sound Effects & Music, and any coding (with help from Online forums and knowledgeable peers) were created entirely by Aaron Lehnen, Finished on November 16th 2018.

More updates will be coming. In the future with time and funding, I will be adding tons of new levels and Music with varying levels of difficulty of enemies and bosses as well as upgrades, lives system and visual Health Meters (as opposed to current invisible point system).

Made this in tribute to some of my favorite Influences from old-school arcade games like Galaga, Batsugan, Mars Matrix etc.
